summary: I specialize in research and development within the Hospitality and Tourism field. As a lecturer and instructor, I am dedicated to helping students and individuals achieve their goals. My extensive experience in the hospitality industry has given me a unique perspective and the ability to bring valuable insights to my teaching and professional endeavors.
